name: Carter Digital
description:
Sharing a passion for digital along and a desire for social and environmental change, James Noble and Paul Beardsell joined forces and launched Carter Digital. This direction has lead to securing thought leading clients such as ANZ, REA Group, Herbert Smith Freehills, The Royal Womens Hospital and Origin Energy. Carter is very active in the creative and art space; re-imagining The Loop, delivering ideas on behalf of National Gallery of Victoria and digital strategies with ACMI.
A strong passion for helping solve real-world problems drives Carter, who actively work alongside not-for-profit organisations including World Vision, Global Change Institute, Headspace and Sustainability Victoria. The company's capabilities cover all facets of digital from, strategy, user experience, interface design and development. A winner of awards for Business, Applications, B2B, Strategy, Education and Public Service, and most recently Platinum and Gold awards in this year at the Creativity International Awards, one of the longest running independent advertising and design competitions in the world. James puts the companyâ€™s success down to; "adopting a reverse approach to projects by focusing on a user's experience in consuming relevant content, and working towards a device agnostic approach."
